assessment.name: Clinical Participation Assessment (CPA)
assessment.weight: Performance hurdle.  Students must meet this criterion regardless of the overall course marks.

assessment.name: Medicine in Society Tutorials (ViM or CiM)
assessment.weight: Performance Hurdle: Satisfactory participation is required to pass

assessment.name: MiS MCQ Quiz
assessment.weight: Compliance Hurdle:Students must meet the requirements to pass the course
